attributes.action: Screaming Lord Sutch On The One Pound Coin
attributes.additional_details:
The greatest Prime Minister this country never had, Screaming Lord Sutch, should be recognised has Sutch by having a picture of him on the back of a pound coin.
Sutch is Life!!!

rejection.details: Recommendations for the design of new coins are made by the Royal Mint Advisory Committee on the Design of Coin, Medals and Seals to the Chancellor of the Exchequer. He in turn makes recommendation to Her Majesty the Queen, who is ultimately responsible for the design of coins
